title: Marina Kaljurand — Women in Foreign Policy | #wifp

time_markers.text: in August of the same year
quotes: At that time, we were not sure that in August of the same year, we would have our own country to run.
Currently, I am 55-years old, and I have changed the topic I have worked on in every 3-4 years.

organizations.name: Ministry of Foreign Affairs
quotes: I was the 21st member of Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and today we have over 600 people working in the Ministry.
The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Estonia is small, and thus one cannot be a specialist in one field- be it security, development or environment for example.

organizations.name: Press and Media Department
quotes: I started at the Press and Media Department, then I worked as a lawyer in the Ministry, after that as a Consul.

organizations.name: European Union
quotes: I was part of Estonia’s accession negotiations with the European Union.

organizations.name: OECD (Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development)
quotes: Then, I led the accession negotiations to OECD (Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development).

roles.title: lawyer in the Ministry

roles.title: Consul
quotes: I started at the Press and Media Department, then I worked as a lawyer in the Ministry, after that as a Consul.

roles.title: Deputy Secretary of Trade and Development
quotes: Then, I was Deputy Secretary of Trade and Development.
The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Estonia is small, and thus one cannot be a specialist in one field- be it security, development or environment for example.
I was part of Estonia’s accession negotiations with the European Union.
